item.description: Thoughts on Radicle vs GitHub Economic Challenges for the US Government https://radicle.xyz/blog/collaborating-on-radicle.html https://docs.radicle.xyz/docs/understanding-radicle/how-it-works Conducting Science on the Web3 https://cen.acs.org/people/profiles/argument-using-blockchain-secure-scientific/96/i46 https://www.digital-science.com/press-release/digital-science-and-katalysis-lead-initiative-to-explore-blockchain-technologies-for-peer-review/ Using Knowledge Graphs in Web3 https://neo4j.com/developer-blog/defi-knowledge-graph-with-neo4j/
